title: EP 111 Circle of Power
itunes:title: EP 111 Circle of Power
description:
In this episode the GC crew discusses power and the people that will do anything to have it. We then head down South, the ATL to be exact and we tap in with the homie Big Gipp from Goodie Mob and talk about everything from the Feds infiltrating Hip Hop, to those that have sold their soul for the almighty dollar. The homie gets deep, so pay attention.

On another note, we have some big plans over the next 6 months. We are looking to produce Gangster Chronicles content on the road and in the process of building our own studios. We are asking that you join us on this journey, Imagine us in Africa chopping it up with freedom fighters? paypal.me/digitalsoapboxmedia 

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
